item.title: TB is the #1 killer among infectious diseases. A new study says its toll could mount
item.description: New research estimates that as many as 2.2 million more people could die of tuberculosis if U.S. cuts to foreign aid become permanent.

item.description: For the first time since 2020, COVID is not one of the 10 leading causes of death in the U.S.
